Docs.summary: Special case for reading inside a WS-Trust 1.3 RST.
Docs.returns: A that contains the SecondaryParameters found in the RST.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The specification states that a `SecondaryParameters` element cannot be inside another `SecondaryParameters` element. Override this method to provide custom processing.

Docs.exception: An inner element was found while processing the outer element.
